tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I booked appointment through Practo for general health checkup. I was given slot of 11:00 -11:30 am by Practo. I reached hospital at around 10:45am. Receptionist said Dr. comes at 12:00 noon and they do not get any booking from practo and they had already given appointment someone at 12:00 and I could consult after him. Do I had to wait till 12:30pm for consult. Dr. Is good. He listens carefully and suggest accordingly. I was satisfied with the consultation with Dr. But very disappointed with waiting time of more than one and half hour. I request practo to coordinate with the hospital to give proper time to patients.

tags: Wait time,
review: ****** *** **** *** their receptionist and other facilities are too bad. I booked an appointment for 7pm but there is no such system exists there. When asked she check my file and said for review there is no appointment, seriously? Very bad response. Unless you know there is no one in queue do not visit even you have appointment. It was sweating in the waiting room but they didn't bother to switch on AC until it is too late. ******** ****** ****** ** **** **** *** this clinic and it's maintenance are very poor for the fee they are charging.

tags: None
review:
Doctor is very good in treating people. He did all the tests which are required and he explained the problem clearly. He only do all the tests like TEcho CIT etc except ECG. And best thing is all the tests comes under package which is very less cost.
I strongly recommend this doctor for Heart problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Since my LDL was high, visited doctor for regular heart checkup. Process is smooth, took ECG, 2D echo and TMT tests. Fortunately tests are negative. Doctor suggested regular exercise and changing working conditions in home (as work from created unfortness)

review: Me, my father, family members have been seeing Dr. R. Balaji for last five plus years at Chanda Nagar, Clinic for all our Cardiac and Family Health Issues.  His ability to listen, empathize, social outlook, minimum tests and medicines and commitment to medical ethics and values is what makes him unique, valuable in current society.  Hence when any of my friends call me I recommend him for all cardiac and family health related issues.  I am really blessed, privileged to have known him because in 21st century Healthy Person is real Happy and Rich Person.
